system.description: The true wanderer, they are a bit like Amazons of the land. Always on the move and scouting about, rangers never like to have much responsibility if they can help it and prefer to be on their own. Gritty and worn like old leather, these characters are unflinching and realistic at all times. If you are playing a Ranger, keep watch, seek solitude, long for the woods and be introspective.

overview.base: Choose 3 species. Your @L[Core:Damage]{damage} is @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted} against them. You can change your chosen species during a @L[Core:Long Rest]{long rest}.
overview.proficient: You may choose @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} additional species.
overview.fluent: You may instead choose @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} additional species.

overview.base: While in the wilderness, you are always considered to have a @L[Property:Mana Storing]{mana storing} (@L[Property:Mana Storing]{mana storing}: 1) item on you. It stores and you can invoke with your hand to access it with @L[Ability:Access Stored Mana]{Access Stored Mana}.
overview.proficient: The wilderness is instead @L[Property:Mana Storing]{mana storing}: @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P}.
overview.fluent: The wilderness is instead @L[Property:Mana Storing]{mana storing}: @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F}.

overview.base: Pick a @L[Category:Tradecrafts]{tradecraft} and @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluency} relating to the moral of your story (subject to @L[Core:GM]{GM} approval). All creatures that listened to your story in full gain that @L[Category:Tradecrafts]{tradecraft} and @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluency} for the duration of this ability.

Once every 10 minutes, you @L[Core:Healing]{heal} and regain that many @L[Core:HP]{HP}. This does not consume the @L[Core:Hit Die]{hit die}. If you were @L[Condition:Dead]{dead}, this brings you back to live with the number of @L[Core:HP]{HP} you rolled.

You @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} @L[Condition:Down]{dropping} due to being at negative @L[Core:MP]{MP}. You still @L[Condition:Dead]{die} when you reach half your maximum @L[Core:MP]{MP} below zero and suffer other consequences from negative @L[Core:MP]{MP}.
